remarks: The product rule when one argument is a constant.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvcmul.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvcmul.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvcmul.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
dvcmulf.df $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D F ) = X ) $.
dvcmulf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( ( S X. { A } ) oF x. F ) ) = ( ( S X. { A } ) oF x. ( S _D F ) ) ) $.
